last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Their love has withstood everything thrown at them but can Jang Hyun and Choon Hee overcome one more test.

name: Lovers of Music
overview: When she's not making ends meet, Choi Choon Hee hones her skills in trot music, an old-fashioned, but heartfelt genre. Her luck turns when she pairs up with Jang Joon Hyun, an arrogant songwriter who excels in pop hits, as well as Jo Geun Woo, a shrewd talent CEO. Choon Hee's star burns hot, but between work and love, can she overcome the haters and trot her way into success?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Choon Hee and Joon Hyun first meet they immediately don't get along and things only get worse from there.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In order to save his career Joon Hyun must help Choon Hee start her career, as a singer.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: It turns out that of all the people banking on Choon Hee's success, Joon Hyun is the least trustworthy of them all.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Working with Joon Hyun and becoming a singer seems to be Choon Hee's only chance to pay off her fathers debts.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The next big step for Choon Hee's singing career has her competing against the best young singer at Shine Star, Park Soo In.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Choon Hee might be working a bit to hard but it's official, she is now a real singer.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: When it comes down to a decision about her family, Choon Hee has no choice but to risk her reputation.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: With Choon Hee's star rising jealousy from those within Shine Star may prove to be an issue.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Joon Hyun agrees to become Park Soo In's producer, further pushing Choon Hee away.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Choon Hee becomes the target of a political scandal.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Things were looking good for Joon Hyun and Choon Hee's relationship but an accident changes everything.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Joon Hyun hasn't recovered his memory yet but he knows that something about his current life is not right.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Park Soo In and her mom continue to try and sweep what she did under the rug but a bump on the head may ruin their plans.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Joon Hee must pretend to have not regained his memory to protect Choon Hee.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: It's finally time for the truth about Joon Hyun's accident to come out.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Their love has withstood everything thrown at them but can Jang Hyun and Choon Hee overcome one more test.
